outline:
1. to quiver, totter, shake, reel, stagger, wander, move, sift, make move, wave, waver, tremble
    1. (Qal)
      1. to wave, quiver, vibrate, swing, stagger, tremble, be unstable
      2. to totter, go tottering
        1. vagabond (participle)
      3. (Niphal) to be tossed about or around
      4. (Hiphil)
        1. to toss about
        2. to shake, cause to totter
        3. to shake, disturb
        4. to cause to wander
kjv_def: continually, fugitive, [idiom] make, to (go) up and down, be gone away, (be) move(-able, -d), be promoted, reel, remove, scatter, set, shake, sift, stagger, to and fro, be vagabond, wag, (make) wander (up and down).
strongs_def: to waver, in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively (as subjoined)
